name: LOST:SMILE memories + promises
description:
-Everyone is looking for something they got lost.

The 2nd project presented by LIFE0 of visual novel, “Seven Days You and I will spend seven days” that all heroines are dead,
Set in the summer of Okinawa, (Maybe) LIFE 0 First and last royal road love ADV .

While being healed by the gentle flow of time on a remote island in summer,
A nostalgic club story that touches the stories of people who live there.

And the only truth you will come to.

South Island love ADV "LOST: SMILE" that lives with lost things

―――――――――――――――――

※ "LOST:SMILE memories" is the first part.
　>> Included Story: Misuzu, Jun, Meguru

―――――――――――――――――
STORY

Hoshi Mishima-.
A beautiful island of stars and sea located at the southern end of Japan.
The island where my father was born and raised.
I was brought in when I was small, but I didn't remember anything from that time.
I was watching that island. I'm dead now, following the image of my father.

Purely drawn love story
A pure love story depicting losing and kindness through love with the girls in Hoshimijima.
Then, reaches one truth.
